text: Hanford is an unincorporated community in Cerro Gordo County, in the U.S. state of Iowa. ==History== A post office was established at Hanford in 1900, and remained in operation until it was discontinued in 1913. The community was named for Hanford McNider, the son of an Iowa banker. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Cerro Gordo County, Iowa Category:Unincorporated communities in Iowa
title: Hanford, Iowa
